$client = new IamClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'region' => 'us-west-2',
    'version' => '2010-05-08'
]);

try {
    $result = $client->addUserToGroup(array(
        // GroupName is required
        'GroupName' => 'string',
        // UserName is required
        'UserName' => 'string',
    ));
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    error_log($e->getMessage());
}
